app.description: Displays Chargebee customer and subscription details next to the support ticket.
app.name: Chargebee
app.installation_instructions:
Step 1: [Sign up with Chargebee](https://www.chargebee.com/trial-signup/) (If you already have an account, skip this step)
Step 2: Click "Install"
Step 3: For "Region", input 'us', 'eu', or 'au'. All other inputs defaults to 'us'.
Step 4: You'll be able to see the Chargebee widget on the ticket details page in Zendesk with the following information: Request to log in to your Chargebee account (if you are not already logged in to Chargebee), or Subscription details of the corresponding requestor (if you are already logged in to Chargebee)

region.label: Region
region.helpText: Please input 'us', 'eu', or 'au'. All other inputs defaults to 'us'.
